subject: Refugees and Displaced Persons
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: In an attempt to draw attention to refugees, a small team of them will compete under the Olympic flag at the Summer Games, the president of the I.O.C. said.
snippet: In an attempt to draw attention to refugees, a small team of them will compete under the Olympic flag at the Summer Games, the president of the I.O.C. said.
